name: finnigram
description: A modern messaging platform built with production-grade engineering practices

scripts.install:all: npm install && npm run install:services && npm run install:mobile
scripts.dev:services: concurrently "npm run dev --workspace=services/user-service" "npm run dev --workspace=services/message-service" "npm run dev --workspace=services/realtime-service" "npm run dev --workspace=services/api-gateway"
scripts.build: npm run build:services && npm run build:mobile
scripts.fix: npm run lint:fix && npm run format && npm run typecheck
scripts.fix:services: npm run lint:fix --workspace=services/user-service --workspace=services/message-service --workspace=services/realtime-service --workspace=services/api-gateway && npm run format --workspace=services/user-service --workspace=services/message-service --workspace=services/realtime-service --workspace=services/api-gateway && npm run typecheck --workspace=services/user-service --workspace=services/message-service --workspace=services/realtime-service --workspace=services/api-gateway
scripts.fix:mobile: npm run lint:fix --workspace=mobile && npm run format --workspace=mobile && npm run typecheck --workspace=mobile
